Module anderson.c482
Package anderson.c482.controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
anderson.c482.controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the class for ModifyProductController. This is controller for ModifyProduct view

      public javafx.scene.control.TextField modProductIdTxt

      public javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> modProductPartTable

    • modProductAssociatedId

      public javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> modProductAssociatedId
      This TableColumn displays the PartID in the AssociatedPartsTable. This TableColumn displays the PartID in the AssociatedPartsTable. The table contains the associatedParts for the selected Product.

      public javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,String> modProductAssociatedName
      This TableColumn displays the PartName in the AssociatedPartsTable. This TableColumn displays the PartName in the AssociatedPartsTable. The table contains the associatedParts for the selected Product.

    • modProductAssociatedTable

      public javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> modProductAssociatedTable
      This is the TableView for displaying all the associatedParts. This table displays all the associatedParts for the selected Product

    • prodToModify

      public static Product prodToModify
      This Field is for receiving a Product from MainView. This Field is used when the MainController is sending a Product to be modified on the ModifyProductView

    • prodToModifyIndex

      public static int prodToModifyIndex
      This field is for receiving a Products index. This Field is used when the MainController is sending a Product to be modified on the ModifyProductView. The index is used to keep track of location in the ProductObservableList

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the ModProductView. This method populates the partTable and associatedPartsTable. The prodToModify Field is used to take data received from MainCController and populate the appropriate text and tables.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - url for initializing
      resourceBundle - resourceBundle for initializing

    • onActionAddPartToProduct

      public void onActionAddPartToProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method adds a Part to the selected Product. This method takes a Part from the Parts table and adds it to the associatedPartsList of a Product
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent for when the add button is clicked

    • onActionRemovePartFromProduct

      public void onActionRemovePartFromProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method removes an associatedPart from the selcted Product. This method removes a Part from a products AssociatedPartsList
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent for when the Remove button is clicked

    • onActionSaveProductDisplayMain

      public void onActionSaveProductDisplayMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is for saving and returning to MainView. This method saves the information changed into the existing Product and updates the ProductsObservableList
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent for when the Save button is clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is for returning to MainView. This method return user to MainView and cancels any inputs into the text fields or changes to associatedPartsList
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent for when the Cancel button is clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSearchPart

      public void onActionSearchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method search the Part table on the ModifyProductview. This method takes an input from a text field and searches the associatedParts table for matching input and displays on associatedParts table
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent for when search text field is used

    • sendData

      public static void sendData(Product p, int index)
      This method is for receiving data from MainView. This method takes the selectedProduct from the MainView and assigns its index and information to provided Fields.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the selectedProduct location in the ProductsObservableList
      p - holds the information from the selectedProduct from MainView
